recipes.name: Simple Biscuits
recipes.instructions:
In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt 
 Cut butter into small pieces and and to the mixture 
 Add milk and stir until combines 
 Take out dough and work it on a floured surface 
 Flatten dough and fold it on itslef mutliple times to make internal layers 
 Flatten dough and cut out small circles or rip out small size balls of dough 
 Place on paper lined baking sheet and bake

recipes.name: Cornbread Muffins
recipes.instructions:
In a mixing bowl, combine cornmeal, sugar, salt, and baking powder 
 Add in egg, milk, and oil until mixed 
 Pour into lightly greased muffin pan, about 1/4 of the way up 
 Bake
